function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inaccurate or misleading ieq data collection and transmission","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The spread of covid-19 due to physical interaction and lack of lockdown measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of occupant presence and actions on building energy use","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High energy use in unoccupied buildings","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Energy performance gap in buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of research on actual energy performance of buildings","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unoccupied buildings may still consume energy, leading to wastage and increased costs","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close collaboration and physical interaction between municipal staff, researchers, and project partners may increase the risk of contagious disease spread.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to close interaction during communication between municipality and electric utility company","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of structured information leading to inefficiency in data analysis and management","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of cross-contamination and disease transmission through close contact with public infrastructure such as public lighting and traffic lights","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential impact of social distancing measures on service energy consumption","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited impact of lockdown measures on energy use by systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 due to unusual occupation of social assistance buildings and community centers during the pandemic.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased energy consumption in municipal buildings due to the shift to work-from-home policies during the lockdown.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pandemic outbreak of coronavirus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Nearly unoccupied municipal buildings, elementary schools, and nursery schools","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The study involves analyzing energy consumption in buildings, which could be a potential indicator of building occupancy and human activity, both of which contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unexpected energy consumption in unoperated buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Minimal energy usage during lockdown","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inaccurate measurement of basal eui","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Violation of lockdown measures leading to increased building occupancy","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of safety protocols for in-situ visits to buildings during the pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced occupancy leading to continuous operation of systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Energy consumption variations due to lockdown","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Encouragement of telemedicine service instead of visiting clinics","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Small health centers not attending covid-19 patients directly","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Historical average energy use decrease due to lockdown measures","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High energy use in buildings, impacting the environment and resources","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible waste patterns in energy use during diminished occupancy","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Impact of occupant presence and actions opa on total energy use in buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in energy consumption in health centers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in energy consumption in buildings","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Zero energy consumption in some buildings","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced occupancy in buildings during lockdown","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Continuous operation of data processing rooms with servers and racks in administrative building","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Equipment left in stand-by mode","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Continuous operation of equipment such as refrigerators and stand-by plug loads in elementary and nursery schools","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Uncertainty and variations in energy consumption may not be considered in the eui estimation model, leading to discrepancies between estimated and actual values.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unnecessary stand-by plug loads, such as computers, risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unoccupied building leading to higher energy demand than necessary","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 due risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher ventilation rates in buildings due to covid-19 increase energy use","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Abnormal energy use risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Residual energy consumption due to community use of the building during the pandemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for
